```{r setup}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r extract}
#Extract Pertinent Data 
chess_tournament <- read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AngelClaudio/DataSources/master/tournamentinfo.txt",
                             col_name = ("raw"), skip = 4) %>% 
                                filter(row_number() %% 3 != 0) 

```

```{r extract-to-vectors}
#Data munging
#chess_tournament %>% mutate(PlayerNumber = str_extract(raw, "^\\d+"))
PlayerNumbers = str_extract(chess_tournament$raw,"^\\d+")
PlayerNumbers = PlayerNumbers[!is.na(PlayerNumbers)]

#Get next raw bit of data (1st remove extracted data)
chess_tournament <- str_replace(chess_tournament$raw,"^\\d+\\s\\|\\s","")

#player_names =
```
